changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE tables.executed_work ( id UUID NOT NULL DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4() PRIMARY KEY, order_id UUID NOT NULL, customer_id UUID NOT NULL, user_id UUID NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(80) NOT NULL, coast NUMERIC NOT NULL, date_time TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES tables.order (id), FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES tables.customer (id), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES tables.user (id) );
